output:
There is an indefinable mysterious power that pervades everything. I feel it, though I do not see it.
It is this unseen power which makes itself end, and yet decides all things.
I mean, that is the expression of the human body. I mean, everything. I mean, you know, not just the hair.
And when you're talking about fighting as it is, with no real fighting world, then baby, you better train every part of your body.
